descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2hi89bb.png[/img]
A [b]hidden unlockable[/b], standalone, follower mod and armor independent fighter.
- Uses UNP body.
- Uses her own armor.
- Does not need any follower mod to take her as the extra follower.
All clues to get her are found within vanilla whiterun.
Hopefully i can get screenshots from you guys! :D
[s]For those who can't be bothered to find her. Use the placeatme console command.[/s]

Issues:
07/06/2015 - any interested people who wants to contribute to the clues, pm me.
If the custom clue does not appear, make a clean save and shift the mod to the bottom of load order.

My other similar mod:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35335
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61298
author: fantasy19
